The Milwaukee Bucks ( 57 - 19 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers ( 45 - 31 ) 128 - 118 on Wednesday at the BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center in Milwaukee . The Bucks got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Clippers 28 - 25 right away in the first quarter . The Bucks were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 55 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers finished at 44 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from deep . The Bucks also out - rebounded the Clippers 47 - 46 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Bucks were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , who posted 34 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 12 - 14 FT ) , nine rebounds and five assists in 32 minutes . It was his second game in a row reaching double - digit points in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 10 rebounds . Khris Middleton had a strong showing as well . He went 16 - for - 25 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 39 points , to go along with nine rebounds and five assists . It was his second game in a row with double - digit points , as he 's combined for 49 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 15 points and 6 rebounds on the year . JaMychal Green also had a solid showing , finishing with 16 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , six rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's now averaging 15 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Wilson Chandler chipped in with 15 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 5 - 6 3Pt ) and two rebounds off the bench . The Bucks ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday , while the Clippers will travel to New_York to play the Knicks on Saturday .

Shooting was key , as the Raptors hit 54 percent of their shots , while holding Chicago to just 44 percent on their end . The Raptors also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Chicago , while committing two less turnovers . The Raptors ( 54 - 23 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and they simply did n't have enough bullets to win this game . The Magic were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks finished at 51 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from deep . The Magic also out - rebounded the Mavericks 48 - 42 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Magic were led by Luka Doncic , who went 9 - for - 20 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 24 points , while also adding eight rebounds and five assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 17 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Nikola Vucevic also had a solid showing , finishing with 20 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , 13 rebounds and six assists . He 's had a nice stretch of two games , combining for 44 points and 25 rebounds over that span . Coming off the bench , Jonathan Brunson added 18 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and nine assists , while DJ Augustin added 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) and two assists . The Magic 's final game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Mavericks will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Saturday .
The Orlando Magic ( 32 - 38 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 17 - 52 ) 120 - 91 on Wednesday at the Amway_Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 36 - 20 in the first quarter alone . They were able to out - rebound the Cavaliers 50 - 43 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Magic were able to force the Cavaliers into 15 turnovers , while committing only nine of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Magic were led by the duo of Collin off the bench from DJ Augustin . Augustin went 7 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding seven assists and two steals . It was a season - high in points for him as well , as he 's averaging only 7 points per game on the year . Coming off the bench , Aaron Gordon added 21 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) of his own , to go along with six rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block in 29 minutes . It marked his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Cavalier to reach double figures in points was Terrence Ross , who came off the bench for 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and four assists in 26 minutes . The Cavaliers ' next game will be on the road against the Toronto Raptors on Wednesday , while the Cavaliers will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .

The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 114 - 114 , at American_Airlines_Center on Saturday . In a battle between two of the top - five offenses in the league , the Warriors were able to prevail with a big road win . In fact , Dallas held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . Shooting was key , as the Warriors hit 51 percent of their shots , while holding the Warriors to just 44 percent on their end . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Warriors recording 21 assists to just 12 turnovers , while the Mavericks committed 12 turnovers to just 21 assists . The Warriors ( 29 - 14 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and they did n't have enough bullets to win this game . Stephen Curry was the player of the game , as he tallied 48 points , six rebounds , five assists and two blocks on 17 - of - 32 shooting . Kevin Durant was second on the team , finishing with 28 points , seven rebounds and five assists . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 14 rebounds . Harrison Barnes led the way for Dallas , as he tallied 22 points and four rebounds . Luka Prince was huge off the bench , providing 26 points , six rebounds and five assists .

The Nets will look to get back on track as they go on to play host to the 76ers on Monday .

The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 113 - 107 , at Barclay 's Center on Friday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows just which way . It was a near wire - to - wire win for Brooklyn , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . Shooting was key , as the Nets hit 12 - of - 33 from three - point range , while Cleveland went just 16 - of - 38 from long distance . The Nets also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Cleveland , while committing four less turnovers . The Cavaliers ( 16 - 49 ) have now lost five - straight games , as they continue to slide down the standings . D'Angelo Russell led the way for Cleveland , as he tallied 25 points , four rebounds , five assists and three steals . Kevin Love finished second on the team , totaling 24 points , 16 rebounds and four assists . Jarrett LeVert was a nice spark off the bench , providing 14 points and four rebounds on 5 - of - 12 shooting . Brooklyn will look to keep rolling on Tuesday against the Detroit Pistons .

The Denver Nuggets ( 50 - 23 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 37 - 37 ) 95 - 92 on Wednesday at the Pepsi_Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Pistons 39 - 9 in the first quarter alone . The Nuggets were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons finished at 44 percent from the floor and just 28 percent from deep . The Nuggets also out - rebounded the Pistons 56 - 56 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Nuggets were led by Blake Griffin , who posted 29 points ( 12 - 32 FG , 2 - 10 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , 15 rebounds and five assists . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 28 points and 15 rebounds per game . Jokic on the other hand shot 10 - for - 24 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 23 points , to go along with 15 rebounds and two assists . He 's been a force on the defensive side of the ball lately , as he 's averaging 25 points and 7 rebounds over his last three games . Reggie Jackson also had a solid showing , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 2 - 9 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and five assists . He 's now averaging 15 points and 7 rebounds on the year . The only other Pistons player to reach double figures in points was Andre Drummond , who finished with 13 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and 17 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 29 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . The Nuggets received a big contribution from Nikola Jokic , who went 10 - for - 24 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the free throw line to score a team - high of 23 points , to go along with 15 rebounds and two assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 23 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 21 points and 12 rebounds on the year . Paul Millsap also had a solid showing , posting 10 points ( 2 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , 13 rebounds and five assists . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 10 points and 12 rebounds . The Nuggets ' next game will be on the road against the Los_Angeles Lakers on Tuesday , while the Pistons will travel to Utah to play the Jazz on Monday .

The Pacers ( 30 - 15 ) have been one of the hottest teams in the league over recent weeks , but they 'd lost four of their last five contests . However , they were able to walk away with a hard - fought victory over the Mavericks ( 20 - 25 ) , who 'd entered the All-Star break with a slim four - game winning streak . Harrison Barnes led the way for Indiana with 20 points , three rebounds and two assists . Domantas Sabonis was next with a bench - leading 16 points , which he supplemented with 11 rebounds and two assists . Darren Collison was next with a bench - leading 16 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , three assists , two steals and a block . Wesley Matthews was next with 17 points , three rebounds and two assists . Tyreke Evans was next with a bench - leading 19 points , which he supplemented with two assists and a steal . Victor Oladipo was next with 12 points , eight rebounds , six assists and three steals . DeAndre Jordan posted a 15 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included a pair of blocks . Cory Joseph paced the reserves with eight points , five rebounds and four assists . The Mavericks head back home to face off with the Phoenix Suns on Monday night , while the Pacers head to the Big Apple to tangle with the New_York Knicks on Sunday afternoon .
The Indiana Pacers ( 36 - 19 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers ( 30 - 26 ) 116 - 92 on Wednesday at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 36 - 31 right away in the first quarter . The Pacers were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers finished at 44 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from deep . The Pacers also forced the Clippers into 19 turnovers , while committing just 19 of their own . The Pacers were led by Bojan Bogdanovic , who shot 12 - for - 19 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 29 points , while also adding seven rebounds and three steals . It was his third double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 12 rebounds per game . Montrezl Harrell also had a strong showing , scoring 19 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 FT ) , to go along with four assists and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 19 points and eight rebounds . Myles Turner had a strong showing as well . He went 7 - for - 8 from the field and 3 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 17 points , while also adding four steals and six blocked shots . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points , 8 rebounds and 10 blocks . The Pacers ' next game will be on the road against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday , while the Clippers will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Saturday .

The Blazers ( 26 - 17 ) have been one of the NBA 's hottest teams since the start of the new year , but the Blazers ( 19 - 22 ) have been one of the worst home teams in the league . However , the Hornets ( 19 - 22 ) were able to pull away from the Hornets ( 19 - 22 ) on the second night of a back - to - back on the back of Damian Lillard , C.J . McCollum and C.J . McCollum . The duo combined for 71 of Portland 's 127 points on the night , while the Hornets ( 19 - 22 ) countered with a 37 percent success rate from the field . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who managed 18 points , three rebounds , three assists and a steal . Jeremy Lamb was next with 15 points , five rebounds , an assist and a steal . Evan Turner was next with 15 points , five rebounds , three assists and a steal . Jake Layman was productive as a reserve as well with nine points , five rebounds and two assists . The Hornets are in third place in the Eastern_Conference 's Southeast Division , and are currently slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to Utah to take on the Jazz on Monday night .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 32 - 20 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 29 - 23 ) 132 - 105 at Moda_Center on Wednesday . The Trail_Blazers came into this game as a rare road favorite and they did just that . The Blazers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and didn  t disappoint . The Blazers were lights - out from the field , as they went 16 - for - 32 from three - point range in the win . They also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 46 boards to the Jazz 36 . Utah has been playing some great ball recently , but this was a tough task against a potent Portland team . Damian Lillard was the player of the game , as he tallied 36 points , eight rebounds and 11 assists in the win . C.J . McCollum also had a nice game , as he tallied 30 points , three rebounds and two steals in the win . Utah will look to keep up this defensive momentum on Thursday against the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The Miami Heat ( 25 - 27 ) defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 32 - 21 ) 118 - 108 on Monday at the Moda_Center in Portland . The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Trail_Blazers 34 - 30 right away in the first quarter . The Heat were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Trail_Blazers finished at 44 percent from the floor and a meager 28 percent from deep . The Heat also out - rebounded the Trail_Blazers 46 - 33 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Heat were led by Jake Layman , who shot 11 - for - 17 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 25 points , while also adding eight rebounds and a steal . It was his second game in a row with 20 or more points , as he 's been a nice surprise for the Heat over his last two games . Hassan Whiteside did n't have his best night shooting the ball , but still finished with 28 points ( 11 - 12 FG , 6 - 7 FT ) , while also adding 11 rebounds and two blocked shots . It marked his third double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 10 rebounds . The only other Blazer to reach double figures in points was Josh Richardson , who finished with 18 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and four rebounds . The Heat 's final game will be on the road against the Utah Jazz on Wednesday , while the Trail_Blazers will travel to Utah to play the Jazz on Monday .

The Wizards ( 23 - 32 ) came in to Friday 's contest looking to snap a three - game losing streak , but they were able to pull out a victory against a feisty Cavaliers ( 11 - 44 ) squad . Bradley Beal led the way with a game - high 25 points , along with 13 assists , six rebounds and a pair of steals . However , the rest of the starting five was able to tally double - digit scoring , and the second unit was able to tally double - digit scoring , as they posted respective success rates of 55 and 47 percent from the field and three - point range , respectively . The Cavs were led by a pair of 10 - point efforts from Larry Nance , Jr. and Marquese Chriss , with the former adding a season - high 19 rebounds , six assists and three steals , and the latter supplying eight boards , two assists and a steal . Jordan Clarkson was next with 24 points , six rebounds , three assists and a steal over 32 minutes off the bench . Jordan Clarkson was next with 24 points , six rebounds , three assists and a steal . Jordan Clarkson was next with 24 points , six rebounds , three assists and a steal over 32 minutes off the bench . Jordan Clarkson was next with a bench - leading 24 points , along with six rebounds , three assists and a steal . The Cavaliers improved to 23 - 32 and remain atop the Eastern_Conference 's Southeast Division . They remain home to face the Orlando Magic on Monday .

The 76ers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 34 - 30 right away in the first quarter . The Sixers were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers finished at just 44 percent from the floor and a meager nine percent from beyond the arc . The Sixers were led by the duo of Joel Gallinari and Tobias Harris . Gallinari went 5 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 25 points , while also adding eight rebounds and four blocked shots . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 25 points and nine rebounds . Tobias Harris also had a big game , finishing with 24 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , eight rebounds and three assists . He 's now averaging 24 points and 6 rebounds on the year . The only other Sixer to reach double figures in points was Lou Williams , who came off the bench for 26 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and two assists in 24 minutes . It marked his third double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Sixer to reach double figures in points was JJ Redick , who scored 18 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) in 35 minutes . The Sixers ' next game will be on the road against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday , while the Clippers will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Saturday .

The Jazz ( 43 - 30 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and they did a great job of hanging around in this game . Rudy Gobert was the player of the game , as he tallied 21 points , 14 rebounds and four blocks on 9 - of - 11 shooting . Derrick Favors finished second on the team , totaling 13 points and six rebounds on 6 - of - 10 shooting . Donovan Prince was a nice spark off the bench , providing 16 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Utah will look to keep rolling on Wednesday against the Detroit Pistons .

The Dallas Mavericks ( 24 - 28 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 11 - 42 ) 111 - 98 on Monday at Quicken_Loans_Arena in Cleveland . The Mavericks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 40 - 25 right away in the first quarter . The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 42 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks also out - rebounded the Cavaliers 50 - 44 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Mavericks were led by Luka Doncic , who went 13 - for - 25 from the field and 4 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 35 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and six assists . It marked his third double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 10 rebounds . He 's now averaging 15 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Harrison Barnes also had a solid showing , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt ) and five rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The other Cavalier to reach double figures in points was Alec Burks , who finished with 11 points and eight rebounds . The Cavaliers ' next game will be on the road against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday , while the Cavaliers will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Saturday .

It was his second game in a row with a double - double , as he 's combined for 44 points and 25 assists over his last two . He 's now averaging 25 points and 10 assists on the year . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . He 's had a very strong stretch of four games where he 's averaging 21 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists . The Celtics were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks finished at 44 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from deep . The Celtics also out - rebounded the Hawks 43 - 40 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Celtics were led by Jeremy Lin , who finished with 19 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) , 10 assists and three steals in 30 minutes . It marked his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 38 points and 23 assists over his last two games . He 's now averaging 17 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Kyrie Irving also had a solid all - around game . He went 4 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while also adding four rebounds and three assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 29 points and 23 rebounds over his last two games . Coming off the bench , Aron Baynes chipped in with 16 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) and nine rebounds . The Celtics ' next game will be on the road against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday , while the Hawks will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Saturday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 124 - 123 , at Philips_Arena on Wednesday . The Hawks ( 9 - 16 ) have been one of the hottest teams in the league over the last two contests , and Monday 's win was just what the doctor ordered . The Hawks ( 4 - 10 ) were able to pull away from the Hornets ( 9 - 10 ) on the second night of a back - to - back , as they jumped out to a 32 - 43 lead after one quarter . However , the Hawks ( 9 - 10 ) mounted a furious comeback in the third , outscoring the Hawks by a 33 - 24 margin over the final 12 minutes . The Hornets were led by Malik Monk , who managed 26 points , two rebounds and a steal . Kemba Walker was next with 22 points , nine assists , five rebounds , a steal and a block . Kent Bazemore was next with a bench - leading 20 points , which he supplemented with five assists , four rebounds and a block . Nicolas Batum was next with 14 points , five assists and four rebounds . Jeremy Lamb was next with a bench - leading 13 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , three assists and a pair of steals . Jeremy Lin paced the reserves with 13 points , eight rebounds , three assists and a pair of steals . The Hornets remain in last place in the Eastern_Conference 's Southeast Division , and are currently slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to Miami to take on the Heat on Monday night .
The Golden_State Warriors ( 16 - 9 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 5 - 19 ) 128 - 111 on Monday at Philips_Arena in Atlanta . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hawks 34 - 17 right away in the first quarter . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks finished at 44 percent from the floor and just 28 percent from deep . The Warriors also out - rebounded the Hawks 39 - 35 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Warriors were led by the duo of Kevin Durant and Stephen Curry . Durant went 10 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding eight assists and five rebounds . It was his third double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 25 assists over his last two games . Curry , on the other hand , went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 6 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 30 points , while also adding three rebounds and two assists . He 's had a very strong stretch of three games where he 's averaging 24 points , 8 rebounds and 4 assists . Klay Thompson also had a big game . He scored 27 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , while also adding eight rebounds and two assists . He 's now averaging 27 points and 8 rebounds on the year . The only other Hawk to reach double figures in points was John Lin , who scored 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and handed out a team - high of five assists . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday , while the Hawks will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Saturday .

The Jazz ( 36 - 27 ) have been one of the hottest teams in the league over the last two weeks , as they 'd lost three of their last four contests . However , the Jazz ( 36 - 27 ) have been one of the league 's hottest teams since the start of the new year , and have now won four of their last five games . The Pelicans ( 36 - 27 ) have been one of the league 's hottest teams , having won four of their last five games , including a back - to - back against the Pelicans ( 36 - 27 ) . However , they were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , outscoring the Jazz by a 33 - 24 margin in the final 12 minutes to secure the win . The Pelicans were led by a pair of 19 - point efforts from Rudy Gobert and Julius Randle , with the former adding 19 rebounds and two blocks , and the latter supplying eight boards , five assists , two steals and a block . Derrick Favors was next with 16 points , four rebounds , an assist and two blocks . Jrue Holiday was next with 30 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal . Jae Crowder was next with a bench - leading 20 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block . Elfrid Payton was next with 10 points , six assists , four rebounds , a steal and a block . Joe Ingles filled out the stat sheet with 11 points , 11 assists , four rebounds and a steal . E'Twaun Moore paced the reserves with seven points , a rebound and an assist . The Pelicans remain in last place in the Western_Conference 's Northwest Division . They head to Oklahoma_City to take on the Thunder on Monday night .

He went 2 - for - 8 from the field and 10 - for - 12 from the free throw line to score 14 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and four assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 14 points and 12 rebounds . The Mavs ( 16 - 17 ) were able to pull away in the third quarter , outscoring their hosts by a 34 - 23 margin over the final 12 minutes . However , the Mavericks ( 16 - 17 ) battled back in the second period , outscoring their visitors by a 34 - 23 margin over the final 12 minutes . Anthony Davis 's 32 - point , 18 - rebound double - double led the way for the visitors , and he added two assists , a steal and a block . Jrue Holiday was next with 25 points , six assists , five rebounds , a steal and a block . J.J. Barea was next with a bench - leading 18 points , along with seven assists , five rebounds and a steal . Julius Randle was next with 23 points , four rebounds , three assists and a steal . DeAndre Jordan posted a 20 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a block . Devin Harris was productive as a reserve as well with 16 points , three rebounds , an assist and a block . The Pelicans remain in last place in the Western_Conference 's Southwest Division . They 're home again on Saturday night to take on the Sacramento Kings .

The Lakers also out - rebounded the Mavericks 44 - 52 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Lakers were led by Luka Doncic , who went 10 - for - 23 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding eight rebounds and a block . He 's been a force lately , averaging 21 points and 8 rebounds over his last three games . He 's been a force on the boards and is averaging 21 points and 5 rebounds over his last three games . Josh Hart also had a solid showing , finishing with 14 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , 12 rebounds and five steals . He 's been a force lately , averaging 17 points and 4 rebounds over his last three games . The only other King to reach double figures in points was Dwight Powell , who came off the bench for eight points ( 3 - 5 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Lakers ' next game will be on the road against the New_Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday , while the Mavericks will travel to Oklahoma_City to play the Thunder on Wednesday .

It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 23 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 20 points and 11 rebounds on the year . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 29 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 7 rebounds on the year . The Pacers ( 3 - 2 ) came in to Tuesday 's contest having lost four of their last five games , and they were able to pull out a victory against a Spurs ( 2 - 2 ) squad . The Spurs ( 2 - 2 ) were able to pull away from the Spurs ( 2 - 2 ) in the third quarter , outscoring the Spurs by a 34 - 25 margin over the final 12 minutes . The Pacers were led by Victor Oladipo 's 21 points , which he supplemented with nine assists , five rebounds and two steals . Domantas Sabonis was next with a bench - leading 16 points , which he supplemented with 10 rebounds , four assists , two steals and a block . Tyreke Evans was next with a bench - leading 19 points , which he supplemented with five assists , two steals and a block . Bryn Forbes was next with a bench - leading 15 points , which he supplemented with four assists and two rebounds . Cory Joseph was productive as a reserve as well with 12 points , six rebounds , four assists and a steal . The Spurs head back home to face off with the Phoenix Suns on Monday night , while the Spurs remain home to tangle with the Los_Angeles Clippers on Sunday afternoon .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 110 - 106 , at AT & T Center on Saturday . The Spurs ( 3 - 2 ) have been one of the best home teams in the league , but the Spurs ( 3 - 2 ) were able to prevail with a big road win . The Spurs ( 3 - 2 ) were led by DeMar DeRozan , who scored a game - high 30 points on 14 - of - 23 shooting , to go along with 12 rebounds and eight assists on 14 - of - 23 shooting . LaMarcus Aldridge added 15 points , five rebounds , three assists and two blocks , while Kyle Aldridge added 15 points , five rebounds and three assists on 7 - of - 16 shooting . The Spurs ( 2 - 4 ) were led by LeBron James , who finished with 35 points , 11 rebounds and four assists on 13 - of - 21 shooting , including 2 - of - 6 from behind the arc . LaMarcus Aldridge added 15 points , five rebounds , three assists and two blocks on 7 - of - 16 shooting across 33 minutes . Bryn Forbes was the only other player to score in double figures for the Spurs , as he finished with 16 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting , to go along with nine rebounds and two steals , in 31 minutes . The Spurs will look to bounce back as they visit Milwaukee on Tuesday .

The San_Antonio Spurs ( 8 - 7 ) defeated the Golden_State Warriors ( 12 - 6 ) 104 - 92 on Monday at the AT & T Center in San_Antonio . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Warriors 33 - 27 right away in the first quarter . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors finished at 44 percent from the floor and just 20 percent from deep . The Spurs also out - rebounded the Warriors 48 - 46 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Spurs were led by Kevin Durant , who finished with 26 points ( 8 - 25 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , 10 rebounds and six assists . He 's had a very strong stretch of two games , combining for 44 points and 25 rebounds over that span . He 's now averaging 24 points and 11 rebounds on the year . DeMar DeRozan also had a solid showing , finishing with 20 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) and nine assists . He 's now averaging 20 points and 8 assists on the year . The only other Warriors to reach double figures in points was Quinn Cook , who came off the bench for 12 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt ) and two rebounds . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday , while the Warriors will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Saturday .

The San_Antonio Spurs ( 12 - 14 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers ( 15 - 10 ) 133 - 120 on Monday at the AT & T Center in San_Antonio . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 32 - 21 right away in the first quarter . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers finished at 44 percent from the floor and 38 percent from deep . The Spurs also out - rebounded the Lakers 48 - 43 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Spurs were led by the duo of LeBron James and Kyle Aldridge . James went 13 - for - 28 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 35 points , to go along with eight rebounds and 11 assists . He 's been absolutely unstoppable over his last two games , combining for 38 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists over that span . He 's now averaging 21 points and 6 assists on the season . Kyle Aldridge also had a solid showing , finishing with 14 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 14 points and 12 rebounds . The only other Laker to reach double figures in points was JaVale McGee , who recorded 12 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 12 rebounds in 24 minutes . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday , while the Lakers will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Saturday .

The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 96 , at AT & T Center on Saturday . The Spurs were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this dominating win . In fact , there were 10 ties and 15 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than seven points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with San_Antonio recording 28 assists to just six turnovers , while the 76ers matched their assists and turnovers at 10 a piece . The Spurs also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Philadelphia , while committing five less turnovers . The Spurs ( 20 - 12 ) have been playing better lately , but this was a tough task against a hungry San_Antonio team . DeMar DeRozan was n't far behind , totaling 20 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Joel Embiid totaled 13 points , 11 rebounds and five assists of his own . Rudy Gay was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 21 points , six rebounds and three assists . On deck for the Sixers is a road matchup against the New_Orleans Pelicans on Sunday . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 17 - 10 right away in the first quarter . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 48 percent from the floor and 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were led by the duo of LaMarcus Aldridge and Kyrie Irving . He 's been very inconsistent lately , averaging 27 points and 6 rebounds over his last three games . He went 10 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a season - high of 30 points , while also adding four rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second impressive performance in a row , as he 's combined for 57 points and 14 rebounds over his last two games . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way with 30 points on 12 - of - 21 shooting , to go along with nine rebounds , six assists , one steal and two blocks on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Bradley Beal added 21 points , seven assists and four steals , while Trevor Ariza added 20 points , four rebounds and two assists on 6 - of - 17 shooting . Patty Mills was the only other player to score in double figures for the Spurs , as he added 15 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting , including 3 - of - 6 from behind the arc . Next up , the Wizards visit the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Spurs visit the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Phoenix Suns , 126 - 124 , at AT & T Center on Saturday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows just which way . It was a near wire - to - wire win for San_Antonio , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 20 - plus minutes . Defense was key for the Spurs , as they held San_Antonio to 43 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range . The Suns also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Phoenix , while committing five less turnovers . The Suns ( 11 - 42 ) have now lost five - straight games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Devin Booker was the player of the game , as he tallied 38 points , five rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Jamal Crawford was huge off the bench , providing 22 points and seven assists . Patty Mills was a nice spark off the bench , providing 12 points , four rebounds and five assists . On deck for Phoenix is a road matchup against the Los_Angeles Clippers on Sunday . The Spurs ( 30 - 22 ) have now won seven of their last seven games , as they continue to slide down the standings . The San_Antonio Spurs ( 34 - 29 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 29 - 31 ) 105 - 93 on Monday at the AT & T Center in San_Antonio . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 32 - 27 right away in the first quarter . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons finished at 44 percent from the floor and just seven percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs also out - rebounded the Pistons 55 - 41 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Spurs were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who finished with 24 points ( 11 - 22 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , five rebounds and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 12 rebounds per game . Reggie Jackson also had a solid showing , finishing with 22 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 5 - 12 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and two assists . He 's now averaging 17 points and 7 rebounds on the year . The only other Pistons to reach double figures in points was Marco Belinelli , who came off the bench for 17 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) and five rebounds . The Spurs had a huge bench presence , with both Jakob Poltl and Patty Mills reaching double figures in points . Poltl had 11 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and 14 rebounds , while Mills had 11 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) and three rebounds . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday , while the Pistons will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Saturday .
